title: Reorder homepage sections to the assigned Story → Characters → Clans → Episodes → Gallery → News order

requirements.text: Reposition the existing homepage content sections so they appear in this exact vertical order on the main page: Hero, Story (About section), Characters, Clans, Episodes, Gallery, News / Updates, and ensure the existing Header navigation scroll targets still land on the correct section DOM ids (#hero, #about, #characters, #clans, #episodes, #gallery, #news).

quotes: reposition existing sections so they appear in the correct order on the page

acceptanceCriteria: On the main (non-admin) view, the rendered section order from top to bottom is: Hero, Story/About, Characters, Clans, Episodes, Gallery, News / Updates.

Clicking HeaderNav items (Story, Characters, Clans, Episodes, Gallery, News) scrolls to the correct section and the section ids remain unchanged (#about, #characters, #clans, #episodes, #gallery, #news).
No new sections are added and no section content is removed; this change is layout/order only.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not redesign section content, styling, or animations beyond what is required to reorder the sections.
Do not change backend canister logic or data models.
